label: ball
caption: A young boy, bundled up in a warm brown coat, runs across the lush green grass of a park, his bright eyes fixed on the soccer ball as he kicks it high into the air with all his might. The sun casts a gentle glow over the scene, illuminating the vibrant colors of the field and the joyful expression on the child's face. As the ball soars through the sky, it leaves behind a trail of movement, capturing the carefree spirit of childhood.
